summary: This document contains the Articles of Incorporation and amendments for Financial Strategy Group, Ltd., later renamed Southern Country International Ltd. It details the corporation's structure, powers, and the individuals involved in its formation and management.

Jeffrey Epstein is the President and Richard Kahn is the Treasurer of Financial Strategy Group, Ltd.
Osbert E. Potter, as Lieutenant Governor, certified the incorporation of Financial Strategy Group, Ltd.

events.title: Incorporation of Financial Strategy Group, Ltd.
events.description: The corporation filed Articles of Incorporation in the Office of the Lieutenant Governor.

events.title: Amendment of Articles of Incorporation
events.description: Financial Strategy Group, Ltd. changed its name to Southern Country International, Ltd.

locations: 9100 Port of Sale Mall, Suite 15, St. Thomas, U.S. Virgin Islands 00802
keyFacts: The corporation was initially named Financial Strategy Group, Ltd. and later renamed Southern Country International, Ltd.
The Articles of Incorporation were filed on April 4, 2014.
The corporation is authorized to issue 1,000,000 shares of common stock.
Jeffrey Epstein is listed as the President of the corporation.
Osbert E. Potter certified the amendment of the Articles of Incorporation.
